title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practical Competencies: Inquiry-Based Learning (IBL) Teacher Facilitation Skills Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic scientific inquiry methodologies and experience using simulation tools
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can clearly link learning objectives with assessment rubrics when designing Inquiry-Based Learning (IBL) activities
Learners can monitor the progress of students' inquiry processes in real-time using learning analytics tools.
Learners can apply at least three flexible instructional adjustment strategies when unpredictable learning pathways occur.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
